location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter dated 20 July regarding Bruce's appointment by Sir Gore Ouseley, British Ambassador at the Court of Persia, on a commission for the examination of Mahomed Nebbee Khan [Muhammad Nabi Khan, former Governor of Bushire]'s accounts as Minister of Fars.
